refnamediv.refpurpose: How to verify that the target startup monitoring functionality of the NSC correctly identifies targets have started, and sets the node state accordingly via the NSM.

refsect2.title: Target units
refsect2.para:
This testing requires the existence of focussed.target, unfocussed.target and lazy.target units.
If they do not exist, they can be created by executing the following:
cp /lib/systemd/system/{graphical,focussed}.target cp /lib/systemd/system/{graphical,unfocussed}.target cp /lib/systemd/system/{graphical,lazy}.target

refsect1.title: Test Cases
refsect1.para: The following test cases for Target Startup Monitoring are described in this document:

refsect1.title: 1. Starting the Node Startup Controller tries to change the Node State

refsect2.title: Description
refsect2.para: Starts the NSM dummy and the Node Startup Controller and verifies that it attempts to set the node state.

refsect2.title: Test Commands
refsect2.programlisting: systemctl start nsm-dummy.service systemctl start node-startup-controller.service

refsect2.title: Desired behaviour and Output
refsect2.para: The DLT log should now contain the following log messages:

row.entry: [Active state of unit "node-startup-controller.service" changed to active]

refsect1.title: 2. Starting focussed.target tries to change the node state

refsect2.title: Description
refsect2.para: Starts the focussed.target systemd unit and verifies that it attempts to set the node state.

refsect2.title: Desired behaviour and Output
refsect2.para: The DLT log should now contain the following log messages:

row.entry: [Active state of unit "focussed.target" changed to active]
[Failed to set the node state: error code 2]

refsect1.title: 3. Starting unfocussed.target tries to change the node state

refsect2.title: Description
refsect2.para: Starts the unfocussed.target systemd unit and verifies that it attempts to set the node state.

refsect2.title: Desired Behaviour and Output
refsect2.para: The DLT log should now contain the following log messages:

row.entry: [Active state of unit "unfocussed.target" changed to active]

refsect1.title: 4. Starting lazy.target tries to change the node state

refsect2.title: Description
refsect2.para: Starts the lazy.target systemd unit and verifies that it attempts to set the node state.

refsect2.title: Desired behaviour and Output
refsect2.para: The DLT log should now contain the following log messages:

row.entry: [Active state of unit "lazy.target" changed to active]
[Failed to set the node state: error code 2]

refsect1.title: 5. Stopping a target unit will not try to change the node state

refsect2.title: Description
refsect2.para: Stops a systemd unit and verifies that the Node Startup Controller doesn't try to set the node state.

refsect2.title: Desired behaviour and Output
refsect2.para: The DLT log should now contain the following log messages:

row.entry: [Active state of unit "focussed.target" changed to inactive]
